website_summaries.verdict: Environmentally friendly choice, with recycled polymers in the material and rust-resistant stainless steel hardware. Looks like real wood.
pros: Never requires re-staining or water sealing
cons: Uncomfortable angle between seat and back

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased four of these chairs and I have to agree with the other reviews. Very solidly made. They seem like they will hold up well to wind and weather. However they are NOT comfortable to sit in on their own. I'm 5"2" and my husband is 5'9" and neither of us feel they are comfortable due to the weird angle. We have two cheapo plastic Adirondack chairs that are far more comfortable to sit in than these. So now that we've invested in four of these chairs, we are throwing more money at them and buying the ottomans and some lumbar pillows in an attempt to make them more comfy.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for tall people!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect for very tall people. I'm 6'2" and I'm not used to a chair fitting nicely. I can see that shorter people may not like the size and angles of this chair. It took me some getting used to in order to easily get up and down, new muscles having to go to work... The look of the chair is great. The material it is made from does have a nice wood look with even slight color variations as naturally weathered outdoor wood furniture would without all the upkeep and splinters.
customer_reviews.author: cstephens

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These are big, comfortable, sturdy chairs with nice wide arms that can hold drinks and food. This model has a flat back which I like but some people don’t. They are comfortable for me (6’ 200lbs) but smaller folks might want a back pillow. I like how easy they are to clean. Just a spray with vinegar/water mix and wipe down with a damp cloth does the trick. I hope they last a long time being outdoors because I like them a lot second to maybe a hand made hardwood adk chair for 2-3x the cost.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyJones

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are perfect for us and we have received a lot of feedback from everyone who sits on them that they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: livnthedrm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chair - Made in USA!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chairs. I ordered two along with tables and foot rest for my patio. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Screw heads are a real PAIN in the neck
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both extremely handy with tools. So when we went to put the tool into the holes of the bolt they don't easily match up with the tool. You need to rotate the tool several times to get it to fit the bolt head. We can put a ma on the moon but we can't make a hexagon hole fit a hexagon tool? Expect more out of your product! We are Americans - we can make it so much better. Comfort is good - not great. Look is good. Sturdiness is pretty good but I'm questioning whether I could have got them better made and already assembled by the Amish.
customer_reviews.author: quilter77

customer_reviews.title: Lovely appearance, and solid product...expect to handle years of abuse!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look of these chairs. They are lighter than expected, but they are solid. I have had them for some time, and I'm confident that they can handle year-round abuse in the Florida sun (even though we live right near the water). Now, I would suggest the use of an impact driver for screwing in the screws. Man, this stuff is really hard and the holes appear very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Construction, Easy to Assemble, and made in the USA, not China!
customer_reviews.text: It took me 20 minutes to set up two of these chairs--the instructions were simple and the materials high quality. Once set up, these chairs are very elegant and colorful. For ultimate comfort, a pillow needs to be put on the back of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: great addition to backyard
customer_reviews.text: the chairs were easy to put together. 10 or so minutes per. i bought 4. hardest part is lining up holes between back and chair. just got them and they are perfect. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Great. Sturdy. Big. Looks enough  like wood.
customer_reviews.text: Subtracted one star as came a stripped screw when chair almost completely assembled. Amazon generously reimbursed chair as to dissemble and mail back would’ve been a project. I’ll order another one. I have several others—no problems.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn miller

customer_reviews.title: Sits low and a little awkward, plastic is a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: It’s no polywood. It kind of wobbles as you sit down into it and it sits low. One big plus though is that the back is VERY high, so you can rest your head.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Nice reasonably priced alternative to wood
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, reasonably priced alternative to wooden Adirondack chairs, that simply cannot handle the Northeast weather without rapid aging. Very well packaged although there was a small chip in one rail. I was very quickly sent a replacement rail with screws and easily replaced the rail. They do not have the obvious plastic appearance of many synthetic chairs and look like wood from a distance. The test will really be how they hold up after a few winters.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch BK

customer_reviews.title: Love, love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these chairs!!! Easy to put together, but takes 2 people and bout 30 min per chair. They are very comfortable and very good looking. We’ve had lots of compliments. The color is exactly as shown online. I would order again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Very Sturdy and Attractive Chair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these chairs. I plan to buy more in the spring. The dark green is almost black and just the color I was looking for. I am able to move them around when I need to but they are still heavy enough to not blow over on our windy property.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Crouse

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY: 5 STARS; COMFORT: 3 STARS
customer_reviews.text: Good price, well constructed, and seems to be durable. Easy to assemble. It's not as comfortable as other Adirondack chairs I've sat in. The back is totally flat. If it was more comfortable I would've given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lumberjack Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy chairs that look nice and hold up well in the elements
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality chair. I highly recommend. Very similar to the trek deck material so good for long outdoor use
customer_reviews.author: Tyson T

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these chairs a few weeks ago, assembled them in approximately 10 minutes and they are beautiful!! Very sturdy!! I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Ron P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chair
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Highwood. All poly furniture seem to hold up well, these are just a little nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Although they are expensive, they were just what we were looking for. Sturdy and nice looking. We didn't want the plastic chairs that break in a year, not wooded (that rot). These fit the bill perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: We purchased two of these chairs and love the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these chairs and love the look and feel. However, after just a little more than one year, one of the seat slats broke. My husband glued it and reinforced the under side, and time will tell if that remedy holds up--however, the slat should not have broken after just a little more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these about a month or so ago when they went on lightning price. First off, very easy to put together, 4 pieces, it you can't do it get a teenager to. They seem like good quality. I like the darker wood look. They sit up a bit more than my old woods ones so I wish the back was a bit more reclined myself. Overall we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Karen and Jen Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, assembly is pretty simple (ALL SCREWS ARE IDENTICAL, they must have changed that since previous posts), sits well and is comfortable. Nowhere near as heavy or "solid" as Polywood, but that can also be a negative. Materials feel a little frail, but I think that's because I'm used to Polywood. Price is much better the Pwood as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hander

customer_reviews.title: Too bad, no way to adjust it
customer_reviews.text: Beautifeully put together and packaged... but, once assembled, was strange and uncomfortable to sit in for both a six footer and a five footer. Too bad, no way to adjust it, the butt level is just too low, different from other Adirondacks we own.
customer_reviews.author: pendragon5

customer_reviews.title: Great Adirondack Chair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of these chairs, love them. They withstand all weather and still look great. After years of maintaing real wood chairs and purchasing them time after time, these chairs were the best purchase we could of made for our yard. Close enough look of real wood for us. Will be purchasing more from this collection.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Terrific quality. Gorgeous color
customer_reviews.text: Terrific quality. Gorgeous color. Totally easy to put together. I love it. ALSO it arrived even earlier than promised. Exceeded my already high expectations. We'll enjoy this for years.
customer_reviews.author: JaneB

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Very well made and heavy. Impressed by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: woolard!

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product. Wish I could have ordered 2!
customer_reviews.author: antonio fontana

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This chair was a gift for my mother who is not inclined to keep up with outdoor maintenance of items that require constant re-painting and care. This chair is perfect for her. It will last and last with no muss, no fuss, and it is very comfortable as well. She has thoroughly enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, very happy with chairs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Quality of chairs/construction is good. I wish the recline was adjustable but with a lumbar pillow, they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: discoloration of chair
customer_reviews.text: As I just purchased these chairs for the low maintenance ability, within 1 month 1 of the 5 chairs is discoloring. Please advise as to how to proceed. Thank you, Clayton Hersom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these Chairs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of the Nantucket blue and they are a great addition to our pool area. My wife and I assembled in about 10 minutes. Initially planned on purchasing 4 but they are larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Boyd

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Expertly packaged, easy to assemble, solidly built, gorgeous finish in the whitewash. Only problem is that at 5'1" my feet don't touch the ground and the angle where the back of my knees meet the chair is uncomfortable. If I stretch out further to correct this, my lower back isn't supported. I'm ordering the ottoman in the hope that it will provide greater comfort, but it adds significantly to the purchase. I'll give an update once the ottomans arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Winding Cove

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, look great
customer_reviews.text: It took 20 minutes to assemble. These chairs feel and look solid. Looking forward to sipping bourbon in one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: the sturdiness of wood without the prospect of termites or weather damage
customer_reviews.text: I know the chair is "faux wood" but you will be not be disappointed by the sturdiness and beauty of this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Carla A Kawakami

customer_reviews.title: workmanship issues
customer_reviews.text: We bought two chairs that arrived separately. The first was perfect! Very easy to put together. Very sturdy. The second had a screw point protruding in the arm rest, right where you would rest your hand. I had to file it off, and sink it below the surface with a punch and hammer. Also, one of the slats on the seat has a sore that was stripped, so it moves around. I need to repair this somehow.
customer_reviews.author: David S Drozek

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs. They have survived a full summer of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Chairs. They have survived a full summer of use in the hot Florida sun and high humidity and still look like brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Gramreader

customer_reviews.title: Super Adirondack!
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks great, easy to put together, and made of materials to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L. Poselenzny

customer_reviews.title: engineering?
customer_reviews.text: design flaw has two support screws in legs intersecting and only allowing one screw able to support chair....not sure how long until it inevitably breaks?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I am so happy that I never have to paint or stain them or worry about rotting wood. Thanks so much! I would recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: good quality had some minor issues in screwing the bolts ...
customer_reviews.text: good quality had some minor issues in screwing the bolts completely i but the customer service is amazing. They shipped me a new chair immediately at no cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We love these chairs. They really were a breeze to our together arrive with all the parts and no damage.
customer_reviews.author: janis

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs I got Blue!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great. I’m tall and the seat is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stasio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, Comfortable, and very good looking. Much better than wood and do not have to store them in winter
customer_reviews.author: M C M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Chairs, minimal effort to put together, packaged extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: mr cesario

customer_reviews.title: easy peasey
customer_reviews.text: Took 15 minutes to assemble. The only tool you need is included. Very solid. Very comfortable. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maud Keen

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my deck
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and with a seat cushion they are comfortable, as comfortable as an Adirondack chair can be. They don't have a plastic look to me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The seat part is too deep in the back. Keep you too straight.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered four of these for around our firepit. What a perfect addition. Product arrived as expected. My husband assembled all four in about 1 and a half hours with no issues. Love the low maintenance of this material! Will look for tables to match.
customer_reviews.author: ccunning

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Adirondack Chairs
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of the chairs in white. They are much larger than we thought...a good thing! We absolutely love the classic design and heft of the chair. The chairs look like real wood. That being said the assembly was not as easy as some of the reviews. We ended up going to our local hardware store to buy several of the longer stainless steel screws because the shorter screws did not catch. The protective packaging was spectacular. We highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: cindyloo

customer_reviews.title: Easy sophistication
customer_reviews.text: This chair was incredibly easy to assemble and looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Charlsie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, very sturdy, pleased with the item. Screws required a special bit & didn't go all the way in, you want to first drill holes deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Reba Perry

customer_reviews.title: ... I buy for my home and these did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: I am incredibly particular about everything I buy for my home and these did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble! Very sturdy material. Comfortable and look great! I have received several compliments on these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Adams

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Chairs were easy to assemble and are very comfortable. Would definitely recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but fragile.
customer_reviews.text: I like the thought of a low maintenance outdoor chair. The problem with this material is that it is on the fragile side. If you baby this chair it will last. I have had to glue broken boards (They split where some of the factory screws were placed) and add extra screws to mine (I predrilled holes).
customer_reviews.author: R. Downes

customer_reviews.title: Good but some tweaking of Assembly required.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but the bolts don't line perfectly up for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Callygirl

customer_reviews.title: Problem is the finish
customer_reviews.text: These chairs looked good at first, and were not too difficult to put together, but after being outside for only three weeks, the finish is starting to fade and get a white cast. We thought there was some pollen or dust on them at first, but this won't rub off. Don't know how long before they really start to look bad. Hate the thought of having to take them apart and ship them back.
customer_reviews.author: Kery Kafka

customer_reviews.title: Chairs arrived missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. One box looked like it had been repackaged and was missing instructions and bolts necessary for assembly. The other had only nine of the ten necessary bolts. Some were longer than others and the instructions did not differentiate between the two.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

product_meta.title: Highwood AD-CLAS1-BKE Classic Westport Adirondack Chair, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackWelcome to highwood®. Welcome to relaxation. We are proud to offer the wood-replacement material of choice, as used in America’s largest theme parks, coastal resorts and hot-tub cabinets; now available for your own backyard! With a look befitting harbor towns, lighthouses and sandy beaches, the Classic Westport Chair is perfect for open-air entertaining. The Classic Westport Chair is the perfect assimilation of comfort and style. In fact, many find this to be the most comfortable of all flat-backed Adirondack chairs. The proprietary Highwood high-grade poly lumber used in this product offers the most realistic look of natural wood WITHOUT the headaches of maintaining or replacing every few seasons. Simply wash your highwood® furniture to remove any dirt or grime. Explore the entire line of highwood® products to coordinate other beautiful, durable products that will make your outdoor living space the envy of the neighborhood. Still not sure? Request a free product swatch so you can view the color and composition in person. This product is assembled with 304-grade stainless steel hardware and comes with the assurance of a manufacturer’s 12-year residential limited warranty. The chair has been load-tested, per ASTM 1561-03 (2008) standard for outdoor plastic furniture, and has a 500-pound weight capacity. Some assembly is required (see assembly guide) and assembled chair dimensions are 30"W x 40"H x 33"D (33lbs).
feature_bullets: 100% MADE IN THE USA - backed by US customer service and support
NO SANDING, STAINING, OR PAINTING - yet it looks like real wood
DURABLE, FADE-RESISTANT MATERIAL - assembled with 304 Grade Stainless Steel hardware
WEATHERPROOF - leave outside year-round. Will not crack, peel, or rot when exposed to the elements
EASY TO ASSEMBLE (see assembly guide) - assembled chair dimensions are 30"W x 40"H x 33"D (33lbs). Seat Height is 9. 5 inches. Seat width is 21 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
